name: XDR test 1
desc: Verify that the Edge system can create an XDR message per the specification

name: XDR test 2
desc: Verify that the Edge system can create an XDR message per the specification

name: XDR test 3
desc: Verify that an Edge system can receive a properly formatted XDR message.

name: XDR test 4
desc: Verify that the Edge system throws an error when an incorrect message is received.

name: XDR test 5
desc: Verify that an Edge system can receive a properly formatted XDR message.

name: XDR test 6
desc: Verify that Mutual TLS session is established between the Sender and the Receiver before transmitting data.

name: XDR test 7
desc: Verify that Edge disconnects when the Server provided certificate is invalid.

name: XDR test 8
desc: Test Tool authenticates with the Edge using Mutual TLS correctly

name: XDR test 9
desc: Test Tool authenticates with the Edge using bad certificates

name: XDR test 10
desc:
Test Tool sends a Direct Message, which is translated to an XDR message and sent to the Edge.
Verify that the HISP system can create an XDR message per the specification and forward to Edge.

name: XDR test 11
desc:
Test Tool sends a Direct Message + XDM, which is translated to an XDR message with Limited Metadata and sent to the Edge.
Verify that the HISP system can create an XDR message per the specification and forward to Edge.

name: XDR test 12
desc:
Test Tool sends a Direct Message + XDM, which is translated to an XDR message with Full Metadata and sent to the Edge.
Verify that the HISP system can create an XDR message per the specification and forward to Edge.

name: XDR test 13
desc:
Test Tool sends an XDR Message to the HSIP which then translates the message to Direct and sends to the other HISP.
Verify that an HISP system can receive a properly formatted XDR message and translate to Direct Message.

name: XDR test 14
desc:
Test Tool sends an XDR Message with Full Metadata to the HSIP which then translates the message to Direct and sends to the other HISP.
Verify that an HISP system can receive a properly formatted XDR message and translate to Direct Message.

name: XDR test 15
desc: Verify that the HISP system throws an error when an incorrect message is received.

name: XDR test 16
desc: Verify that Mutual TLS session is established between the Sender and the Receiver before transimitting data.

name: XDR test 17
desc: Verify that HISP disconnects when the Server provided certificate is invalid.

name: XDR test 18
desc: Test Tool authenticates with the HISP using Mutual TLS correctly

name: XDR test 19
desc: Test Tool authenticates with the HISP using bad certificates

name: XDR test 19
desc: Test to validate that the Edge system is able to create messages with unique message id for XDR profile. Edge system sends 3 messages to the Test Tool with unique message ids.

name: XDR test 20a
desc: The SUT must send an XDR message to ETT. ETT will respond with a process MDN. The test lab will inspect the logs to affirm that the SUT handles this case appropriately.

name: XDR test 20b
desc: The SUT must send an XDR message to ETT. ETT will respond with a failure MDN. The test lab will inspect the logs to affirm that the SUT handles this case appropriately.

name: XDR test 48
desc: Test script will ask the Edge system to generate a series of messages (# TBD) and send to a specific address using the Test Tool. (Messages will be asked to be sent as part of multiple sessions) Edge system will have to create message id's unique to each message and include it in the WS-Addressing header.

name: XDR test 49
desc: Test script will validate the direct address block per the section 4.0 XDR and XDM Messaging for Direct v1.0 and per section 1.3 of the "Implementation Guide for Delivery Notification for Direct v1.0".

name: XDR test 50a
desc: Test script will ask the Edge system to send a message including valid recipients.

name: XDR test 50b
desc: Test script will ask the Edge system to send a message including invalid recipients.
